## About me
I am a PhD student in Applied Mathematics at KTH in Stockholm, Sweden. I completed both my Bachelor's and Master's degrees at La Sapienza University of Rome. My research focuses on Stochastic Control theory.

You can view my CV [here](cv.pdf).

**Interests:** Control Theory, Stochastic Calculus, SDEs, BSDEs, ML and Neural Networks, Energy Markets,  Mathematical Finance, Pollution Control

## Inquiries
If you have any questions about my work or are interested in collaborating, please don't hesitate to [contact me](mailto:pucci@kth.se).

:::
